thread.title: Wednesday's TV pick: Keith Lemon's Back t'Future Tribute
thread.title_full: Wednesday's TV pick: Keith Lemon's Back t'Future Tribute

title: Wednesday's TV pick: Keith Lemon's Back t'Future Tribute
text:
Submit 
© ITV It's been 30 years since Marty McFly stepped into Doc Brown's time travelling DeLorean and ITV2 is celebrating in style with Keith Lemon's Back t'Future Tribute . It's Back to the Future Day all day as 21 October 2015 is the date inventor Doc Brown and Marty journey to Back to the Future II . In the film, they visited a world of flying cars and self-tying sneakers, instant pizza and faxes in every room – we hope they wouldn't be too disappointed with the reality!All three films will be airing throughout the day, and then Keith is creating his very own celebratory one-off special to mark the occasion. With the help of some celebrity friends, Keith will remake some of his favourite scenes, with Paddy McGuinness as Biff and Gino D'Acampo taking on the role of Doc, and McBusted performing the film's iconic song, 'Johnny B. Goode'.Keith will also head across the Atlantic to visit some of the film's iconic locations and meet some of the original cast and crew. Keith Lemon's Back t'Future Tribute, ITV2, 9pm
